Package com.sanyavertolet.interview.data.dependencies

Interface DependencyGraph

All Known Implementing Classes:
TopologicallySortedDependencyGraph
public interface DependencyGraph
Interface for managing dependencies between CellReference instances in a data graph. This interface allows the addition, retrieval, and clearing of dependencies, as well as handling cycles and failed cell references within the graph.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addDependency(CellReference before, CellReference after)
    Adds a dependency between two CellReference instances.
    void
    clearAll()
    Clears all dependencies and resets the entire dependency graph.
    void
    clearDependencies(CellReference reference)
    Clears all dependencies related to the specified CellReference.
    void
    clearFailedCellReferences()
    Clears a set of CellReference instances that have failed due tp dependency issues, such as cycles.
    Set<CellReference>
    getFailedCellReferences()
    Retrieves a set of CellReference instances that have failed due to dependency issues, such as cycles.
    List<CellReference>
    getUpdateList(CellReference reference)
    Retrieves a list of CellReference instances that need to be updated when the specified cell is modified.

  • Method Details

    • addDependency

      void addDependency(CellReference before, CellReference after) throws DataSelfReferenceException
      Adds a dependency between two CellReference instances. The dependency indicates that changes to the cell identified by before may affect the cell identified by after.
      Parameters:
      before - the reference to the cell that other cells depend on.
      after - the reference to the cell that depends on before.
      Throws:
      DataSelfReferenceException - if a cell is found to depend on itself.

    • clearDependencies

      void clearDependencies(CellReference reference)
      Clears all dependencies related to the specified CellReference.
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to the cell whose dependencies should be cleared.

    • getUpdateList

      List<CellReference> getUpdateList(CellReference reference) throws DataDependencyException
      Retrieves a list of CellReference instances that need to be updated when the specified cell is modified. The order of the returned list represents the sequence in which updates should occur.
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference to the cell that was modified.
      Returns:
      a list of CellReference instances that should be updated.
      Throws:
      DataDependencyException - if a circular dependency or other error is detected in the graph.

    • getFailedCellReferences

      Set<CellReference> getFailedCellReferences()
      Retrieves a set of CellReference instances that have failed due to dependency issues, such as cycles.
      Returns:
      a set of CellReference instances that have failed.

    • clearFailedCellReferences

      void clearFailedCellReferences()
      Clears a set of CellReference instances that have failed due tp dependency issues, such as cycles.

    • clearAll

      void clearAll()
      Clears all dependencies and resets the entire dependency graph.
